properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM POST WHERE CATEGORY_NO = 1 AND STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS ROW_NUMBER, P.POST_NO, P.CATEGORY_NO, P.TITLE, P.CONTENT, P.COUNT, m.MEMBER_NICKNAME, P.POST_DATE FROM POST P JOIN MEMBER m ON p.MEMBER_NO = m.MEMBER_NO JOIN CATEGORY C ON P.CATEGORY_NO = C.CATEGORY_NO WHERE P.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY P.POST_DATE DESC) A WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
UPDATE POST SET COUNT = COUNT + 1 WHERE pNo = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
